    • Method Detail

      • update

        public int update()
        According the song id, update or insert: if id is -1, insert song if id is greater than 0, update song
        Returns:
        int: 1 if has been updated or inserted, 0 if didn't work, -1 if error

      • delete

        public int delete()
        According the song id, delete that song form the database
        Returns:
        int: 1 if the song has been deleted, 0 if didn't work, -1 if error
